elements.Text: Some people taking tamoxifen or aromatase inhibitors experience pain. However, there are many ways to relieve pain, including exercise, pacing, relaxation, acupuncture, the medicine duloxetine, taking a short medicine break, and switching to a new aromatase inhibitor or tamoxifen.  It is important to consult with your doctor about what to do if you are experiencing joint pain.
What do you plan to do to manage pain?
